body.name: OGX Extra Strength Refreshing Scalp + Teatree Mint Conditioner, Invigorating Conditioner with Tea Tree & Peppermint Oil & Witch Hazel, Paraben-Free, Sulfate-Free Surfactants, 25.4 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 35 mins
features: Refreshed and hydrated: This 13-fluid Ounce bottle of OGX Extra Strength refreshing scalp + tea tree Mint Conditioner moisturizes strands for a serious hair refresh and reset
Soft, shiny locks: the nourishing conditioner features a lightweight formula that gently moisturizes hair leaving locks shiny, soft and hydrated with a healthy look and feel

Hair Care inspired by nature: its unique formula is infused with tea Tree oil to invigorate the scalp, peppermint extract to awaken the senses, and the natural astringent Witch Hazel to help remove buildup and nourish the scalp

Engage the senses: experience a burst of freshness and a sweet Peppermint, iced vanilla and tea tree scent for hair that smells refreshed and renewed plus the sulfate-free surfactant hair care system is paraben-free and gentle On your locks
Real quality, real beauty: unattainable looks don't inspire us but originality does. OGX Hair & Skin Care product collections are here to Help you look your best! We're beauty, pure & Simple.
body.description: Deeply condition hair with a burst of freshness with this tea tree & Mint Conditioner made with Peppermint, tea tree oil & Witch Hazel, it invigorates the senses with a refreshing tingling sensation

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us We’re stylist-founded and on a mission to trailblaze originality. Hey beautiful! We’re inspired by originality, and it shows up in all we do, from how we make and package our products to the real, diverse and photoshop-free passion-fueled people who rep our brand. WHAT WE STAND FOR We ensure to find out what you love about you, so we can use our science to help you love it even more. We strive to curate experience using only high quality and effective ingredients. We ensure to champion inclusivity by celebrating, hiring and building products for all ethnicities, genders, ages and styles.

About Us We’re stylist-founded and on a mission to trailblaze originality. Hey beautiful! We’re inspired by originality, and it shows up in all we do, from how we make and package our products to the real, diverse and photoshop-free passion-fueled people who rep our brand. WHAT WE STAND FOR We ensure to find out what you love about you, so we can use our science to help you love it even more. We strive to curate experience using only high quality and effective ingredients. We ensure to champion inclusivity by celebrating, hiring and building products for all ethnicities, genders, ages and styles.

INSPIRED BY EXPERIENCE. BACKED BY SCIENCE. We want you to want to wash and style your hair, whether you’re watching your curls spring into place or the smell of coconut and vanilla are transporting you to the ocean-side. Our team of scientists constantly evolve our formulas to bring a spa-quality experience coupled with salon-quality safety and ingredient standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner is the best I have had for my hair. The only thing to note is that the mint of it is very strong (stronger than the matching shampoo) and leaves my skin feeling minty/tingly and has felt a bit burn-y if I leave it in for too long (but I have sensitive skin anyway)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the way my scalp feels after using this shampoo & condotioner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for scalp health
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this shampoo for years because it is affordable and keeps my hair and scalp healthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very refreshing on my scalp!
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t feel like this conditioner was very conditioning. When I use shampoo and conditioner in this brand my hair does get dried out. Be sure to leave it in for 3 minutes or it doesn’t do anything. A conditioning mask once in a while will keep hair conditioned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the way this product makes my hair feel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cooling effect on the scalp
reviews.reviewText: Love this conditioner, has that nice cooling refreshing feeling like when you go to a salon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slight tingle on scalp:)
